articles.author: Gina Wadas
articles.title: Under attack: Researchers shed light on how Lyme disease infects body - Phys.org
articles.description: An estimated 476,000 Americans are infected each year with Lyme disease, a condition causing a wide range of symptoms that include fever, rash, and joint pain, as well as effects on the central nervous system and heart. Though it's common knowledge that Borre…
